name: Hinter (itch)
description:
Gameplay 

Hinter is a game based on the true blood chilling "unsolved" crime case of the Bavaria, Hinterkaifeck farm Murders in 1922 and heavily relies on (Actual) Psychological Horror all throughout the game.

Your decisions impact the flow of the game and your experience with a focus on Good and Bad and where they lead you in life.

Hinterkaifeck farm house remake

The Hinterkaifeck farm Murders persisted of 6 members of the Gruber family being killed in a disturbing way with unexplainable events that follow it all throughout

Play as the Head of the family (Andreas Gruber) and experience the events unfold (with enhanced elements to the story) 

Warning

this game is not for people with heart problems, phobias of blood or people under the age of 18 and it is currently in early access so there are features that do not yet work but the gameplay is complete 

Features And Mechanics:

  • Retro 90's aesthetic
  • NPC Dialogue 
  • Multiple Choice Situations
  • Snowy Environment 
  • Usable Vintage Camera 

Hinter; a scare in the winter

Early look; images are subject to change
